rules_text:
Whenever Deepmists Vindicator becomes blocked, [b][each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.][/b]
Impetus {4}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard as a sorcery with only the text in square brackets for {4}{B}. Then exile it.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]She had forgotten the reason for her resentment for the living, but the plane still enabled it.[/i]
